description: Simple lab element based on example database.
name: Lab Element
configuration:
{ "hasContent": true, "hasSummary": false, "hasContentTemplate": true, "contentTemplate": "

${LAB_NAME}: ${RESULT}

${LAB_DATE} - ${LAB_PERFORMED_BY}

", "description": "Simple description.", "titleField": "LAB_NAME", "descriptionField": "DESCRIPTION", "query": "select lab.lab_date, lab_test_lookup.lab_name, lab.result, lab.lab_performed_by, lab.id, concat(lab_test_lookup.lab_name, ' ', cast(lab.result as char)) as description from lab, lab_test_lookup, patient where lab.lab_performed_id = lab_test_lookup.id and lab.patient_id = patient.id and patient.id = ?", "name": "Example Lab", "dataQueryColumns": [ { "keyField": false, "sort": "ASC", "hidden": false, "columnName": "LAB_DATE", "exclude": false, "type": "TIMESTAMP", "displayName": "LAB_DATE" }, { "keyField": false, "sort": "ASC", "hidden": false, "columnName": "LAB_NAME", "exclude": false, "type": "VARCHAR", "displayName": "LAB_NAME" }, { "keyField": false, "sort": "ASC", "hidden": false, "columnName": "RESULT", "exclude": false, "type": "VARCHAR", "displayName": "RESULT" }, { "keyField": false, "sort": "ASC", "hidden": true, "columnName": "DESCRIPTION", "exclude": false, "type": "VARCHAR", "displayName": "DESCRIPTION" }, { "keyField": true, "sort": "ASC", "hidden": true, "columnName": "ID", "exclude": false, "type": "BIGINT", "displayName": "ID" }, { "keyField": false, "sort": "ASC", "hidden": false, "columnName": "LAB_PERFORMED_BY", "exclude": false, "type": "VARCHAR", "displayName": "LAB_PERFORMED_BY" } ], "singleElementQuery": "select lab.lab_date, lab_test_lookup.lab_name, lab.result, lab.lab_performed_by, lab.id, concat(lab_test_lookup.lab_name, ' ', cast(lab.result as char)) as description\r\n from lab, lab_test_lookup, patient where lab.lab_performed_id = lab_test_lookup.id\r\n and lab.patient_id = patient.id and lab.id = ?" }
